professionalbio:
I am a very passionate Application Development Senior Analyst here at Accenture. I spent three years at a software consulting company as a Software Developer prior to transferring to Accenture in 2018. While consulting, I worked professionally with a very wide variety of coding languages and have learned to adapt at the flip of a switch. Prior to consulting, I was the Lead Full-stack .NET Developer on a project under grants from Homeland Security called the Disaster Management Communication System. Creating something that would help first responders in the filed is something I'm really proud of. 


While at Accenture, I have developed numerous technologies that your self might have used! 

These include, but are not limited to, the following:


  • KX Document's PPT Slide Sorter Search: KX Document Search Widget's ability to search through the pages of a PPT document so you don't have to! LINK
  • Ask @Accenture Chatbot On Portal: Originally called Omnibot, It will answer any of your Accenture related needs. It truly lives up to its original name! LINK


My favorite quote:

“Knowledge is knowing that a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.” ? Miles Kington
mycv-skillsonly: Microsoft Visual Studio Team Foundation Server
